title: Check for a Balanced Equation
text: Check if the equation is balanced or not. If not, balance the equation.

title: Find the Amount of Moles of Products formed from the Reactants
text: Set up dimensional analysis $$=$$ Mass of Reactant A * (Moles of Reactant A) / (Molar Mass of Reactant A) $$=$$ Moles of Reactant A. Keep four demical places.

title: Find the Amount of Moles of HCl formed from $$H_2$$
text: mol HCl produced $$=$$ $$3$$ mol $$H_2$$ × $$2$$ mol HCl / $$1$$ mol $$H_2$$ $$=$$ $$6$$ mol HCl

title: Find the Amount of Moles of HCl formed from Cl
text: mol HCl produced $$=$$ $$2$$ mol Cl $$2$$ × $$2$$ mol HCl $$1$$ mol Cl $$2$$ $$=$$ $$4$$ mol HCl

title: Find the Limiting Reactant
text: Compare the Moles of product HCl formed from Reactants $$H_2$$ and Cl. Is Reactant $$H_2$$ producing less Moles of product HCl? If Yes, then Reactant $$H_2$$ is limiting. If the answer is NO, then Reactant Cl is limiting.
